* The league will kick off with the match between MI New York and Seattle Orcas, live on July 5 at 21:30 (CAT).
* ESPN will air three games per week, leading up to the finals at the end of the month.

The Seattle Orcas have signed Pakistani fast bowler Zaman Khan for the upcoming second edition of the Major League Cricket (MLC). This acquisition is expected to enhance the team's bowling attack. Other Pakistani players participating in the tournament include Imad Wasim, who will play for the Seattle Orcas, and Haris Rauf, who will represent the San Francisco Unicorns. **Tournament Details**

* The MLC 2024 tournament will take place from July 5 to 28 in Texas and North Carolina, USA.
* This is the second edition of the tournament, with MI New York being the defending champions.

**Teams and Squads**

* Six teams will participate in the tournament: MI New York, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, LA Knight Riders, San Francisco Unicorns, and Washington Freedom.
* Four of the teams are owned by Indian Premier League (IPL) franchises: MI New York (Mumbai Indians), Texas Super Kings (Chennai Super Kings), LA Knight Riders (Kolkata Knight Riders), and Seattle Orcas (Delhi Capitals).
* Each team has a strong squad with top international cricketers, including Kieron Pollard, Wayne Parnell, Quinton de Kock, Faf du Plessis, Sunil Narine, Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, and Finn Allen.

**Schedule and Format**

* The teams will compete in a round-robin league format, playing each other once.
* The top four teams will progress to the playoffs.
* The playoffs will consist of an eliminator, qualifier, and challenger, with the final taking place on July 29 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.
* The initial 15 matches will be split between two venues: Church Street Park in North Carolina and Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas. The final six group matches and the knockout fixtures will be held at the Grand Prairie Stadium.

**Opening Match**

* The tournament will begin with a rematch of last year's final, with MI New York taking on Seattle Orcas at Church Street Park in North Carolina.

**Season Details**: The 2024 MLC season, also known as MLC 2024 or 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket, will be the second season of the franchise Twenty20 cricket league. It will take place from July 5 to 28, 2024.

**Venues**: Matches will be hosted at two venues: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

**Teams**: Six teams will participate in the 2024 season: Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas, and Washington Freedom. MI New York are the defending champions from the inaugural 2023 season.

**Schedule**: The schedule includes league matches from July 5 to 23, followed by playoffs from July 24 to 28 at Grand Prairie Stadium.

**TV Broadcasters**: MLC matches will be broadcast live on TNT Sports in the UK, with streaming available on discovery+.

**Format**: The league will follow a format similar to the IPL, with six teams competing in a round-robin style before advancing to the playoffs.

**Tournament Details**

* The second edition of MLC will be played from July 5 to July 28, 2024, in the USA.
* Six teams will participate in the tournament: MI New York, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas, Washington Freedom, San Francisco Unicorns, and Los Angeles Knight Riders.
* The teams are based out of major US cities and four of them are owned by IPL franchise owners.

**Schedule and Format**

* The tournament will consist of 25 games, including 21 group stage matches and 4 playoffs fixtures.
* Each team will play every other team once in the group stage, and the top 4 teams will qualify for the playoffs.
* The final will be played on July 28, 2024.

**Venues**

* Two venues will host all the matches: Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas and Church Street Park Stadium in Morrisville.
* The playoffs will be played in Dallas.

**Team Squads**

* Each team can have a minimum of 16 and a maximum of 19 players, with a maximum of 9 international players.
* The squads were formed through a retention window and two drafts.

**Streaming Details**

* The tournament will be broadcast on Sports18 and live-streamed on Jio Cinema.

**Other Details**

* The MLC is a franchise-based T20 competition operated by American Cricket Enterprises (ACE) and has official List A status.
* A maximum of 6 foreign players can be part of the playing XI in MLC.

**Season Details:**

* The second season of MLC will start on July 5, 2024, and the Championship Final will take place on July 28, 2024, at Grand Prairie Stadium.

**Teams:**

* There will be 6 teams participating in the tournament, the same as the inaugural season: Seattle Orcas, MI New York, LA Knight Riders, Washington Freedom, San Francisco Unicorns, and Texas Super Kings.

**Venues:**

* The tournament will be played across two venues: Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

**Format:**

* The format has been changed from a single round-robin to 21 league games, with each team playing 7 games.
* The tournament will then move to the playoff stages, with a Qualifier, Challenger, and Eliminator, followed by the Championship Final.

**List A Status:**

* The MLC has been awarded List A status by the ICC, making it an official T20 League, and all records, runs, wickets, and stats will be added to the official records of the format.

**Game Duration:**

* The T20 format games will last approximately 3-3.5 hours.

**Broadcasting:**

* All matches will be broadcast at 5 locations of Flat Stick Pub, and viewers can also check their local listings for broadcasting channels.
